post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Senior Software Developer/Team Lead :.

Status:  Full Time, Employee        

Senior Software Developer/Team Leader

Gavel and Gown Software is a private Canadian company engaged in the development of the world leading practice management software for lawyers. We are currently looking for a dynamic, energetic and resourceful individual with excellent problem solving and planning.

Reporting to the Development Manager, the successful candidate must be an excellent technical expert and a natural leader.

Responsibilities:

-Analyze product specifications and develop and document technical designs that meet requirements
-Implement high quality code following general specifications
-Provide technical guidance and assistance to team members

Requirements:
-Computer Science or related field degree.
-Minimum two years supervising a team of senior and intermediate software developers
-Minimum 10 years of Software Development experience
-Proven database-driven and client-server application development experience
-Strong application development experience using Visual Basic
-Web development expertise – ASP, Scripting languages, HTML/DHTML, XML
-Ability to prioritize and handle multiple tasks at the same time
-Familiar with the software development cycle
-Ability to work within and meet deadlines

Please apply on-line. Fax submissions will NOT be accepted.  
....................................................................................................................................................................
Contact Information :.
Gavel & Gown Software Inc.
post.title: Senior Software Developer/Team Lead :.
